nodes.text: Kad Solus was a Mandalorian individual who was a foundling and served as the second-in-command to Chieftain Vera Beroya of Clan Awaud, who led a battalion of Mandalorian warriors. Kad was originally born into slavery, and was owned by the Thalassian Nok until a group of Mandalorians ended the operation, which was in actuality a trap laid out by Nok. Since Kad warned the Mandalorians of the ambush, Kad was adopted as a son by Avin Solus.
Kad Solus eventually piloted a Fang fighter during the Age of the Empire.
